TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示将用于处理 控件的 和 事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件上发生的两个事件定义处理程序委托<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> : <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件和事件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>是方法。 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>是方法。 在这两种情况下, 事件数据都包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs>在对象中。
